title: Your moments
authRequired: Sign in to view your overview.
loadError: Your moments could not be loaded right now. Please try again later.

guestMode.dialogBody: Your entries are saved to this browser session.
guestMode.mergeBody: Log in with Google to keep your entries across devices. Your guest entries will be merged and stay safe.
guestMode.wipeBody: You can also wipe your guest data.

profile.dialogBody: Manage your account and stored data.
profile.wipeBody: You can remove all data saved for this account.
profile.deleteBody: You can permanently delete this account.
profile.deleteWarning: Your account and data will be gone forever.
profile.deleteAccountConfirm: Delete your account? This cannot be undone.

affirmations.a1: You are doing well. Every step counts, even the smallest one.
affirmations.a2: It is okay to slow down. Your pace is enough.
affirmations.a3: You are more than your relationship with food. Your value stays.
affirmations.a4: Recovery is not linear. Each day can be a new start.
affirmations.a5: This can feel hard. You do not have to do it perfectly.
affirmations.a6: It is okay to be gentler with yourself today.
affirmations.a7: You decide what feels supportive right now.
affirmations.a8: Even when this feels heavy, you can move one step at a time.
affirmations.a9: Your feelings are allowed. You do not need to push them away.
affirmations.a10: I only accept thoughts that help me and make me feel good.

day.emptyBody: You can add a moment whenever it feels right for you.

entry.deleteConfirm: Delete this moment? This action cannot be undone.
entry.deleteFailed: This moment could not be deleted right now. Try again.
entry.behaviorNotice: You marked this as a hard moment. You can revisit it gently when you are ready.
